---
title: "SPP for PCOR"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
load("~/R/SPP/SPP.RData")
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
pcor <- ts(PCOR[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
plot(pcor)
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(pcor))
```

```{r}
training <- subset(pcor, end=length(pcor)-21)
test <- subset(pcor, start=length(pcor)-20)
fc_training<-forecast(training)
fc_training %>%
  forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test)
```

```{r}
fc_training
```

```{r}
fc_pcor<-forecast(pcor,h=10)
plot(fc_pcor)
```
